features: 🎀 PAMPER YOURSELF WITH SALON-GRADE TOOLS: Our eyebrow trimmer set comes with premium anti-cutting protective Japanese blades, which are especially shard and safe at the same time. Now you can forget nasty cuts.

🎀 KEEP YOUR EYEBROW SHAPER KIT CLEAN & SAFE: The removable blades of our eyebrow shaver for women set makes them easy to clean under running water. Having disposable blades, our eyebrows shapers stay hygienic so you shape your brows with confidence.

🎀 DON’T LEAVE HOME WITHOUT YOUR EYEBROW KIT: Our small face shavers are lightweight so you can take them everywhere with you. You can keep your face razors for women safely in your bag thanks to their protective dustproof cover.

🎀 TAKE THE FUSS OUT OF SHAVING: Designed with an ergonomic, anti-slip handle, our eyebrow shavers are extremely convenient and easy to use. Now you can enjoy a beauty salon-grade experience at home with our eye brow razors for women.

🎀 ORDER YOUR EYEBROW SHAPERS RISK-FREE: Our customers' satisfaction is our priority. That's why we offer you a full refund of your money in case you are not 100% satisfied with your ennva eyebrow razors.
body.description: Are you looking for a compact size women's razor? Are you in need of a reliable brow blade Do you need a reliable women’s eyebrow shaver blade? Introducing The Ultimate Eye Brow Razor Blade 6-Pack For Women By ENNVA! Forget everything you used to know about dermaplaning razors. ENNVA touch up razors will introduce a new shaving experience. The premium materials used in the creation of our small razors will give you the smooth skin you always dreamed of. Why Choose Our Female Face Razors?
